title: Thomas Sankara Speaks: The Burkina Faso Revolution, 1983-87
description: Second edition includes a new introduction by editor Michel Prairie, foreword, maps, chronology and glossary, as well as an index. Thirty-two page photo section features many unpublished photos of the Burkina Faso revolution. You can search for the second addition using the following ISBN 9780873489867.
author: Thomas Sankara
